nav.div: Pickens County School District » Parents » COVID-19 Info » Special Services During Closure

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; padding: 12pt 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; padding: 0pt 0pt 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Letter to Parents Students with IEPs will continue to receive specialized instruction from their special education teachers(s) or therapist(s). During this time at home, it will be of utmost importance for you to stay in close contact with your child’s special education teacher and/or therapist. Grades 3

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 0.6em; vertical-align: super; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: will be able to use chromebooks and/or ipads to access digital learning sites. Our younger grades will be receiving printed learning packets to align with IEP goals.

p.style: margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.38; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; padding: 0pt 0pt 12pt;

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Verdana; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Special education teachers and therapists will be available during their posted hours, and you may e-mail them if you have questions. Until further notice, we will not be offering face-to-face services. Please feel free to notify Special Services at 397-1068 if you need additional assistance.

div.div: 1348 Griffin Mill Road, Easley, SC 29640 | Phone (864) 397-1000 | Fax (864) 855-8159
